00007         Line::Line(Vector2D point, Vector2D vector)
00008         {
00009             this->point = point;
00010             this->vector = vector.normalized();
00011             signedDistanceConstant = - (getNormal() * point);
00012         }
00013

00015         {
00016         }

00018         const Vector2D &Line::getPoint() const
00019         {
00020             return point;
00021         }
00022

00024         {

00028         Vector2D Line::getNormal() const
00029         {
00030             return Vector2D(-vector.getY(), vector.getX());
00031         }
00032 
00033                 Vector2D Line::getClosestPoint(const Vector2D& p) const
00034                 {
00035             Vector2D c = p - point;
00036                         float t = vector * c;
00037                         return point + vector * t;
00038                 }
00039 
00040         float Line::getDistance(const Vector2D &p) const
00041         {
00042             return p.getDistance(getClosestPoint(p));
00043         }
00044 
00045         float Line::getSignedDistance(const Vector2D &p) const
00046         {
00047             return (getNormal() * p) + signedDistanceConstant;
00048         }
00049     }
00050 }
